s: When we began Gilden Tree in 1990, we made a commitment to do things the right way, for the environment and for the people who make, sell and buy our products.

Since 1990, we've been passionate about making natural & organic foot & body care products, using traditional healing ingredients like certified organic aloe vera, jojoba oil and shea butter as the main ingredients.
